name: X7-Chat
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: X7 Chat is a free script that can be modified and redistributed in any way that you want as long as the X7 Chat copyright logo remains in place.

matches.ghdb: inurl:x7chat "Please enter your username and password to login"

matches.regexp: (?-mix:Powered By <a href="http:\/\/www.x7chat.com\/" target="_blank">X7 Chat<\/a> ([\d\.A-Z]+)[\s]*[^&]*© 2004 By The <a href="http:\/\/www.x7chat.com\/" target="_blank">X7 Group<\/a>)
